title: Chalets&Caviar
description: An Openclassrooms course project for a real estate company

title: Move&Groove
description: An Openclassrooms course project. A fitness activity tracking app deployed to Heroku

title: Boulder Bike Tour
description: An Openclassrooms course project featuring a bike race with react.js front-end and rails API back-end, both deployed to Heroku

title: Friendly Neighbour
description: The last Openclassrooms course project. An app where users can register, add help requests on a map and chat between each other.
